document.full_text: through saturday, an average 9.9 million viewers watched each game, up from 9 million last year. for the first time, four networks have been carrying the men's tournament.
document.title: tv ratings for men are highest since 2005
lines_and_colors: through saturday, an average 9.9 million viewers watched each game, up from 9 million last year. for the first time, four networks have been carrying the men's tournament.
